feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [ERI1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack E102E15 maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 13, 08:00 - 11:00 UTC

Sep 11, 17:47 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer on rack E102E15.

This may temporarily affect availability.
Start time: 13/10/2025 08:00 UTC
End time: 13/10/2025 11:00 UTC
Service impact: During the operation, servers in rack E102E15 will be temporarily unavailable.
Service improvement: As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will migrate servers in rack E102E15 to rack ERI0102A01A.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GLOBAL][Dedicated Servers] - Maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 7, 08:30 - 08:45 UTC

Aug 21, 20:59 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, change is scheduled on our API.
âš  API change
The 7th of October 2025, the following API calls will be definitely removed:
- All API calls under /me/installationTemplate
- POST /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/install/start.
Customers can migrate to its successor POST /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/reinstall.

Start time: 07/10/2025 08:30 UTC
End time: 07/10/2025 08:45 UTC
Service impact: None
More details about the change: End of life for personal installation templates.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [LIM3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack LIM0306B03B incident notification
entry.content:
Sep 16, 06:41 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on the rack LIM0306B03B has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 16/09/2025 02:50 UTC
End time : 16/09/2025 06:40 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Servers in rack LIM0306B03B were impacted, being temporarily unavailable or experiencing network latency if LACP was enabled.
Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily unable to access their servers or experiencing network latency if LACP was enabled.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Sep 16, 03:52 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Dedicated Servers offer on the specific LIM0306B03B in LIM3.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 16/09/2025 02:50 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Servers with the LACP service enabled may experience a reduction in network bandwidth in the specified rack.
Customers Impact : Customers with LACP service enabled may experience network latency in the specified rack.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a network equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 16, 03:42 UTC
